name: Appraisd
slogan: Employee performance management and engagement tool that your people will thank you for
description:
Appraisd is an online employee performance review, goal tracking, personal development and employee engagement tool.

It's highly customisable. Every company has its own culture and it's important that they can express that in Appraisd. We don't prescribe anything, but instead give our clients tools to create the system they want.

Behind the product is a fantastic and knowledgeable customer success team that will get to know the client's needs to ensure Appraisd is configured optimally.

team.name: Roly Walter
team.bioHtml: Founder @Appraisd • Worked at @Goldman Sachs

jobs.title: Front end developer, Vuejs
jobs.description:
We are Appraisd, and we’ve built a fantastic tool used by 100’s of organisations to improve the way employees are managed, developed and engaged.

Although we’re a very small team, you could call us an established start up. We’re funded entirely by our customers. There’s no hype, we simply sell a great product.

# What are we looking for?
We’re looking for a *front-end developer* to help us ship our new front end that's being built entirely in VueJS. You'll be coding in Typescript so if you haven't used it before you'll be given help and guidance to get you up and running.


# Essential Skills
- Outstanding native HTML, LESS or SCSS
- Native Javascript (pref Typescript) experience with experience with Vuejs or similar such as Angular or React.
- Webpack / Gulp / Node / other build tools
- Git
- Agile / Scrum
- Handy: .NET MVC and C#, Visual Studio, SQL, Azure etc.


Appraisd is responsive so you’ll need to write both for desktop and mobile – although most of our users view Appraisd on their desktops.

# We can we offer you?
Needless to say we’ll pay you a great wage (please send us your expected salary and current pay) and you’ll work in our very friendly and attractive Kentish Town warehouse office with our small but happy and enthusiastic growing team.

The main thing about working here is being treated like an adult! You’ll be given a lot of responsibility and autonomy as well as plenty of support. You will see the impact of your work, develop your skills and be inspired by others around you. Most of all it will be fun and engaging.

To get the ball rolling, please get in touch with your work history plus examples of work you’ve done already. Please also let us know… 
– what frameworks and libraries you’ve used before or are interested in 
– any Codepen stuff you’ve done 
– an opinion of our website our app 
– what is your expected salary and availability.

To start as soon as possible at our office in Kentish Town.

Absolutely no agencies please.

Thanks,

Roly

Founder
Appraisd
www.appraisd.com
